english: My lord, It is time to wake up.
desc: 파프라를 검정색으로 칠해서 코난 범인처럼 보이게

english: Hmmm.....
desc: 단탈리온을 파프라와 마찬가지로 코난 범인처럼 보이게

english: Lord Dantallion.
...5..more...years....
desc: 단탈리온을 기본 상태로 보여줌 + 눈을 감고 있음

english: (Sigh)
Well then, I shall dispose your secret fund....
Ah... No way!
Hmmph...I do not own such thing.
Ah... No way!
You're finally awake. I am grateful.
But how? It was 'my' secret fund.
Lord Dantallion himself ordered me to manage it.
Ah... Mmm...
(Coughs awkwardly)
So then, what made you to woke me up?
Beep-Beep-Beep-Beep

korean: 지금 시끄럽게 울려대는 이 종소리와 관련이 있는 건가?
english: Does it have something to do with this loud alarm?
Hmmph...I do not own such thing.
I see.

korean: 하면 전하의 빚을 변제하는데 이 비상금을 쓰겠나이다.
english: I shall use it to pay off your debts, then.
desc: 파프라를 기본상태로 보여줌 + 파프라 표정 - 웃음

english: Wait

korean: 다시 생각해보니 그 돈은 과인의 것이 맞다.
english: Now I realize - that belongs to me, for sure.
So leave it be, and get back to work.
My lord...
Beep-Beep-Beep-Beep
Ahh, fine. I am sorry.
Beep-Beep-Beep-Beep
I didn't mean to tease you.
Beep-Beep-Beep-Beep
So stop this noise, will you?
I have done nothing, my lord.
Then, what is this repeated noise?

korean: ...아마 그 소리는 마왕성에 침입자가 들어왔다는 뜻 일듯합니다.
english: ...That sound means that there are intruders in your dungeon, I persume.
Intruder?

korean: 마왕들께서는 허락되지 않은 자가 마왕령에 침입했을 경우, 이를 곧바로 알아챌 수 있다고 합니다.
english: It was told that when the uninvited tresspasses the dungeon, the Demon lords can detect it immediately.

korean: 지금 전하께서 말씀하신 그 소리가 침입자에 대한 경고일 것입니다.
english: The sound you're hearing is probably a warning signal.
Then, It is clear that someone has to deal with them
Carry on.
Me?

korean: 그럼 여기에 그대 말고 누가 있는고?
english: Who else is here besides you?

korean: 전하. 본디 마왕성의 관리는 마왕들의 신성한 의무입니다.
english: My lord, It is Demon lord's sacred duty to manage their dungeon.

korean: 하여 전하께서 직접 침입자를 격퇴하는 것이맞다고 사료되옵니다.
english: so I believe it is appropriate for you to handle them.
How dare!
DO. IT. YOURSELF.
Are you abandoning your duties?
I'm the Demon lord, and you want me to do it myself?
Exactly.
Oh... is that so?
Yes
Urgh....

korean: 지난 번 침입자들을 막은 방어 시설은? 그걸 쓰면 되겠구나. 날 그만 괴롭히거라...
english: Don't we have defense facilities we used when before? Use them, and quit bothering...

korean: 지난 번 사용한 함정이나 병력들을 말씀하시는 건지요?
english: You mean those traps and troops that used before?
The guild took them. all.
What???

korean: 이틀 전, 길드의 집행자들이 찾아와 채무의 변제를 요구하였습니다.
english: Two days ago, guild enforcers came for you - requiring for your repayment
Never heard that before

korean: 그야 계속 주무셨으니까요. 지금까지 총 666번째 방문입니다.
english: Because you were sleeping. This was their 666th visit.

korean: 하여 전하께서 적당히 요구사항은 들어주고 돌려보내라 하셨으니,
english: Since you ordered me to give them whatever they want and send them back,
I signed at the forclosure paper.
Wait, you can't just sign at any paper instead...
YOU. ORDERED. TO. DO. SO.

korean: 그러니, 제가 방법을 찾을 동안 이 일은 직접 해결하십시오. 행운을 빕니다.
english: So please, deal with this yourself - until I find any solutions. Good luck.
So here it is!
Hmm?
desc: 파프라가 오른쪽을 바라보는 구도 / 단탈리온 보다 우측에 위치

english: So, you must be the Devil!
My lord, I see a human.
Yes, I can see his bald head from miles away.

korean: 저런 약해빠진 놈 하나 잡지 못했다니,
english: Hard to believe no one have killed that weakling yet!
Such a waste of time.

korean: 빨리 가라, 머저리들아! 가서 저 놈의 목을 잘라버려!
english: Go get him, bastards! Chop off his head!

korean: 아무래도 저자가 주변 마을의 우두머리인 듯 합니다.
english: Seems that he is the leader of a nearby village.

korean: 그래... 이니티 마을의 이장, 비센테란 놈이다.
english: Yeah... Vicente, mayor of the Initi village.
I'll have to deal with you myself. Bring it on!

korean: 저놈만 처리하면, 다시 침대에서 뒹굴거릴 수 있겠구나..
english: If I defeat him, I'll be back in bed...
It is done. How was it?
My lord, it was surely a surprise.
I can't believe you actually made it all the way through.

korean: 아무래도 전하의 능력을 잘못 판단한 것 같습니다.
english: I may have misjudged your abilities.

korean: 여기까지 오신 전하의 능력에 감탄밖에 나오질 않습니다.
english: I have nothing but to admire your abilities to get this far.
You deserve a applause, then.
(Clap-Clap-Clap)
In fact, we're not ready after this.

korean: 콘텐츠와 시스템을 더 정비하여 이후에 찾아 뵙도록 하겠습니다.
english: We'll be back later with more content and system overhauls.
